snippet.title: Dear RED (Extended Version Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Dear Red is a game based on two choices: Truth or Lie. Each of your choices will lead to a different result. In the game, you are Red, a girl with a plan to look for her mother's murderer to end his life. But nothing goes as expected when you are facing the one whose neck you long to stab day and night.

♦ BUY THE GAME ON STEAM ♦
http://store.steampowered.com/app/453850

♦ DOWNLOAD THE ANDROID VERSION ♦
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dearred.leesang

►  Check out my other works here:
• My games: http://gamejolt.com/profile/lee-sang/...

► Contact me:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sanghendrix
